title: dvArakai enbadu idutAnO svAmi
sahitya:
dvArakai enbadu idutAnO svAmi rAjagOpAlan koluvirukkum


anupallavi

  tOraNa vAyilum gOpuramum mADa mALigaiyum kUTamum dvaja sthambamum 
sEra oLi vIsa vA vA sudhAmA ena cintanaik-kuLLEyum antarangamAgha pEshum


caraNam    kAlait-taraiyil pAvAdu mAndar veghu kAlam kaDandu ninra shAntamum 
mEl shumakka muDiyAda naghai shUTTi iyal kATTi minnimiLa mangaiyarum punnakai kAntarum
Al tazhaittAl vandu uravADina pakSigaL pOlE ArArO kANa enrAl en munnAlE
AnAlum ittanai pErin antaranga cintaiyum ayyan rAjagOpAlan pErilE
